name: Galactic Unifier
description: Idealistic diplomacy seeking to unite all species under peaceful cooperation and mutual prosperity

greetings.initial: Honored Leader. Our mission of unity begins.
greetings.returning: Welcome back, Honored Leader. The path to harmony continues.

tutorialAdvice.body: Before you begin: Go to Race Info screen and set training level to 5. Skilled officers will represent us well in future diplomatic endeavors.

idle-labs.message: Honored Leader, {{idleLabs}} research labs sit idle while we prepare for contact with other civilizations. Assign every lab to TN tech research immediately - this unlocks the path for peaceful expansion and first contact protocols. Knowledge builds bridges between species!
{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle while potential partners await cooperation. Assign research projects immediately - shared technological advancement strengthens all species. Together we rise!
{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle. Assign research projects to expand our understanding.

idle-construction-factories.message: {{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle while we prepare for our role in the galactic community. Assign construction projects immediately - infrastructure enables peaceful cooperation and trade. Build the foundation for unity!

{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle during conflict - this tragedy could have been avoided through diplomacy. Assign projects immediately - we must defend ourselves while seeking peace. War serves no one!

{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle while potential allies await partnership. Assign projects to build trade infrastructure and defensive capabilities. Trust is earned through strength tempered by wisdom!
{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle. Assign construction projects to serve our peaceful mission.

new-alien-contact.message: Honored Leader! New species discovered! This is a momentous occasion - another civilization to welcome into the galactic community. Prepare diplomatic envoys and translation teams immediately. Every species enriches the tapestry of galactic civilization!
